entities.name: frank
entities.description: The narrator of the story, who is trying to understand why they need to wait until the World Cup is over.

entities.name: world cup
entities.description: A global sporting event that Frank and others are waiting for to end.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: An organization that deals with magical matters, mentioned as a place where wizards are pouring in from all over the world.

entities.name: wizards
entities.description: Magical beings who are pouring into the country from all over the world, according to Wormtail.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Non-magical people, mentioned as those who might notice unusual activity if the Ministry of Magic is not careful.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who is speaking to Frank and others in a quiet tone, mentioning the Ministry of Magic and wizards.

relationships.description: Frank is waiting for the World Cup to end, as mentioned in his conversation with Wormtail and others.
Wormtail mentions that wizards are pouring into the country from all over the world, according to the Ministry of Magic.
The Ministry of Magic is concerned about Muggles noticing unusual activity, as Wormtail mentions in his conversation with Frank.
Wormtail seems to be working for or associated with the Ministry of Magic, as he is speaking on their behalf and mentioning their concerns.
